title: Doomed
description: Seventeen-year old Cassandra is a fallen angel with absolutely no plans to take over the family business aka Hell. When she finds out she's cursed and soon bound to Hell forever, she has to come up with a good plan to escape fate.Then she meets Dallas. Trouble is Dallas is mortal and falling for him was never supposed to happen.Love has never been this dangerous when she not only has to change her future, but also escape her destiny.
author: Jayde Scott
